    <title><![CDATA[No winner in Lotto 649 draw for $5M]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/no-winner-in-lotto-649-draw-for-5m-1.3808399</link>
    <description><![CDATA[No winning ticket was sold for the $5 million jackpot in Saturday night's Lotto 649 draw.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3808399</guid>

		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Longueuil police investigate string of snowblower thefts]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/longueuil-police-investigate-string-of-snowblower-thefts-1.3808481</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Police in Longueuil, Que., are asking the public to be vigilant after a series of snowblower thefts in recent weeks.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Associated Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3808481</guid>

(AP / Centre Daily Times, Nabil K. Mark)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Quebec congregation faces lawsuit for alleged sex abuse in Africa]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/quebec-congregation-faces-lawsuit-for-alleged-sex-abuse-in-africa-1.3808407</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A Senegalese man is suing a Quebec-based Catholic congregation for $1.4 million, alleging one of its brothers sexually abused him when he was a boy in the 1980s at a school the religious order ran in Africa.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Giuseppe Valiante]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3808407</guid>
    <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 07:13:52 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 07:13:52 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2634193.1474334020!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[A priest is shown in this file photo.]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Air Canada Express plane returns to Saskatoon due to flames near tail pipe]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/air-canada-express-plane-returns-to-saskatoon-due-to-flames-near-tail-pipe-1.3808280</link>
    <description><![CDATA[An Air Canada Express plane had to return to Saskatoon shortly after takeoff when flames were reported to be coming from it.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3808280</guid>
    <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 20:37:00 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 20:37:00 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.3762357.1516138877!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[Air Canada planes are seen in this undated file image. ]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Patrick Brown, officially running for PC leadership, insists 'my name has been cleared']]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/patrick-brown-officially-running-for-pc-leadership-insists-my-name-has-been-cleared-1.3806636</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Patrick Brown is running to reclaim leadership of the Ontario PC party with a last-minute entry into a race initially launched to replace him, as he continues to deny allegations of sexual misconduct. ]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[CTVNews.ca Staff]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3806636</guid>
    <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 12:03:00 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 22:05:00 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.3807280.1518822408!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[Patrick Brown speaks to media following a meeting at the Conservative Party headquarters in Toronto on Friday, Feb. 16, 2018. (Christopher Katsarov / THE CANADIAN PRESS)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[N.S. government refuses to release cause of fire that killed four children]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/n-s-government-refuses-to-release-cause-of-fire-that-killed-four-children-1.3807038</link>
    <description><![CDATA[The Nova Scotia government is refusing to release the findings of the fire marshal's investigation into a blaze last month that claimed the lives of four children.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Michael MacDonald]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3807038</guid>
    <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 16:00:00 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 16:00:00 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.3752115.1518814749!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[RCMP officers and a representative of the Medical Examiner's office search the scene of a house destroyed in a weekend fire in Pubnico Head, N.S. on Monday, Jan. 8, 2018. (Andrew Vaughan / THE CANADIAN PRESS)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[No winning ticket for Friday night's $55 million Lotto Max jackpot]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/no-winning-ticket-for-friday-night-s-55-million-lotto-max-jackpot-1.3807821</link>
    <description><![CDATA[The Lotto Max jackpot has gone unclaimed for another week, meaning it will continue to grow.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3807821</guid>
    <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 09:22:06 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 09:22:06 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.2474706.1470469469!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[No winning ticket was sold for last night's $55 million grand prize.]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Vancouver artist's cartoon of Florida school shooting resonates]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/vancouver-artist-s-cartoon-of-florida-school-shooting-resonates-1.3807999</link>
    <description><![CDATA[ A Vancouver illustrator says she's overwhelmed by the social media response to her cartoon depicting the victim of the recent school shooting in Florida.]]></description>
    <author></author>
          <dc:creator><![CDATA[Amy Smart]]></dc:creator>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3807999</guid>
    <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:00:00 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:33:00 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.3808000.1518900693!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[Vancouver artist Pia Guerra's cartoon "Hero's Welcome" shows Florida shooting victim Aaron Feis in this undated handout image. (Pia Guerra/HO/THE CANADIAN PRESS)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Manitoba mother speaks out after she was sent video of daughter’s beating]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/manitoba-mother-speaks-out-after-she-was-sent-video-of-daughter-s-beating-1.3807926</link>
    <description><![CDATA[Police are investigating an assault on a 10-year-old girl on a Manitoba First Nation after video of the attack was sent to her mother. ]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[CTVNews.ca Staff]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3807926</guid>
    <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 14:18:00 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 21:18:00 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.3807249.1518821526!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[Hardisty believes Nevaeh’s friend recorded the video from another device after it was posted to a video-sharing social media app.]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
              <item>
    <title><![CDATA[Adding Indigenous name to controversial PEI site an 'insult': Mi'kmaq leader]]></title>
    <link>https://www.ctvnews.ca/canada/adding-indigenous-name-to-controversial-pei-site-an-insult-mi-kmaq-leader-1.3807936</link>
    <description><![CDATA[A member of the Mi'kmaq Nation traditional government says adding an Indigenous name to a Prince Edward Island historic site that bears the name of a controversial British general is a "grave insult" to his people.]]></description>
    <author></author>
              <creditLine><![CDATA[ The Canadian Press]]></creditLine>
            <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3807936</guid>
    <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 14:18:37 -0500</pubDate>
        <ctv:lastModifiedDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 14:18:37 -0500</ctv:lastModifiedDate>  
        			           <enclosure url="https://www.ctvnews.ca/polopoly_fs/1.3807938.1518894871!/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_300/image.jpg"><![CDATA[John Joe Sark, right, conducts a sweet grass ceremony with former Nova Scotia Premier John Hamm, Shirley Wolff Serafini, federal deputy minister of Indian Affairs and Mi'kmaq Grand Chief Ben Sylliboy, left to right, during Treaty Day ceremonies in Halifax on Friday, Oct. 1, 1999. (Andrew Vaughan/CP Photo)]]></enclosure>
		 		         </item>
